name: Raptor Pack - Omega
text: (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card and 1 Dinosaur-type monster in your hand; destroy them, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Raptor Pack" monster from your Extra Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn or the turn after you activate this effect, except "Raptor Pack" monsters or Reptile-Type monsters. You can only use the effect of "Raptor Pack - Omega" once per turn.
